ygData.subject: Re: Twinking is illegal?
ygData.msgSnippet: In beta twinking was illegal. Becouse they wanted to know how fast the different classes lvl ed so they could balance. Though it is not any punishment for
ygData.messageBody:
In beta twinking was illegal. Becouse they wanted to know how fast the
different classes lvl ed so they could balance.

Though it is not any punishment for twinking now(after release), it may be
ethicly wrong.


-----Original Message-----
From: Cristie <cristie@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 1:38 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Twinking is illegal?


>From: "Cristie" <cristie@...>
>
>I think there are a lot of things that are "illegal" that aren't documented
>as such. It almost seems, sometimes, these things are made up by the all
>powerful, as they go along. Who knows. Maybe that person who was
suspended
>for 30 days might like that information to argue her case with the powers
>that be. Hope she is reading this. I also noted that some things I have
>been told are no-no's lately are to be found absolutely NO WHERE in the faq
>on the official site.. go figure.
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: James Dwyer <jdwar@...>
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Date: Monday, May 24, 1999 4:06 PM
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Twinking is illegal?
>
>
>>From: James Dwyer <jdwar@...>
>>
>>Where does it say twinking is illegal? Anyone know? I read the Rules of
>>Conduct and the Game Faq and there is nothing there banning the
>>ownership of high-level items by low-level characters. Just wanted to
>>let people know so that recent posts dont scare people who have high
>>level characters sharing the wealth with them.
>>
>>Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)
>>*Made in Neriak*
>>
>>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>>How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
>>http://www.onelist.com
>>More than 1,000! Create yours now!
>
